articles.author: Lian Buan
articles.title: Rule of law under Duterte drops 51 places in 6 years, among Asia's worst - Rappler
articles.description: The Philippines is now ranked 102 out of 139 countries in terms of rule of law, and 13th of 15 in East Asia and Asia Pacific
articles.content: "In a year dominated by the global COVID-19 pandemic, 74.2% of countries covered experienced declines in rule of law performance, while 25.8% improved. The 74.2% of countries that experienced decline… [+106 chars]
